column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is our most favorite restaurant!  Just celebrated our 30th Anniversary there this past Saturday evening.  Not only was the food absolutely amazing but with the incredible service
column4: with which we were served from Sally and Michael - it made it the most extraordinary experience!  Thank you both - we were showered with love and laughter and so much deliciousness!  You're the BEST!  Can't wait until our next visit!
